name: cross-platform
notes:
# Cross Platform Development

### Haskell
 - Inspired by [Luite Stegemann](http://weblog.luite.com/wordpress/?p=127)
 - [Reflex](https://reflex-frp.org/tutorial) as a framework
 - [Obelisk](https://github.com/obsidiansystems/obelisk/#installing-obelisk) framework and development tool for multi-platform Haskell applications
 - [nix](https://nixos.org/nix/) for package management
   - package for alpine exist
